meanings.definition: A type of arthropod with a cylindrical body and many pairs of legs, such as millipedes.
meanings.sent1: Diplopods are arthropods with lots of legs.
meanings.sent2: Millipedes are a common example of diplopods.
meanings.sent3: The diplopods at the party were the best dancers with all their legs moving in sync.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the diplopods resembled a moving carpet with their numerous legs.
meanings.sent5: The diplopods scurried across the forest floor, their many legs creating a rustling sound.

meanings.definition: The class of arthropods that includes millipedes.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study diplopods to learn more about arthropods.
meanings.sent2: Diplopods belong to the same class as millipedes.
meanings.sent3: At the zoo, the diplopods put on a tiny parade to showcase their class.
meanings.sent4: The diplopods in the exhibit seemed to be discussing the latest arthropod news.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the diplopods crawling in the terrarium, each one a tiny marvel of nature.
